title: The Japanese garden
creator_credit: Japan. National Tourist Organisation and Dentsu
brief_description: Atmospheric shots of misty valleys begin this stylised look at the natural beauties of the Japanese countryside and traditional gardens. Shows use of water and stone ornaments in formal gardens. Oriental music provides a complimentary background. No commentary.
